whenwhere.logisticSubtitle: Where to get to the Trafalgar
whenwhere.logisticDesc:
Travel from Italy or Greece:

For our guests traveling from Athens, Greece, or Sardinia, Italy, we recommend flying into one of the following airports:

- London City Airport (LCY): The closest airport to Greenwich, about 30 minutes away by public transport.
- Heathrow Airport (LHR): A major international hub with excellent connections to central London.
- Gatwick Airport (LGW): Another major airport with good transport links to central London.

Accommodation Options:

We have a few accommodation suggestions to make your stay comfortable and enjoyable:

1. Ibis London Greenwich: A budget-friendly option located just a short walk from the Trafalgar Tavern. (https://all.accor.com/hotel/3146/index.en.shtml)
2. Novotel London Greenwich: A mid-range option nearby. (https://all.accor.com/hotel/3476/index.en.shtml)
3. Hilton London Canary Wharf: We have arranged a discount for our guests at this hotel in Deptford, which is a quick journey to Greenwich. (https://www.hilton.com/en/hotels/loncwhi-hilton-london-canary-wharf/)
4. Radisson Blu Edwardian, New Providence Wharf: An upscale option with easy access to Greenwich. (https://www.radissonhotels.com/en-us/hotels/radisson-blu-edwardian-london-new-providence-wharf)

Getting to the Trafalgar Tavern:

The Trafalgar Tavern is well-connected by various modes of transport:

1. DLR (Docklands Light Railway): The nearest DLR station is Cutty Sark for Maritime Greenwich, which is a short walk from the pub. You can easily connect to the DLR from Canary Wharf, which is on the Jubilee Line.
2. Uber Boat by Thames Clippers: For a scenic route, take the Uber Boat from central London (e.g., Westminster or North Greenwich) directly to Greenwich Pier, which is a pleasant stroll away from the tavern. (https://www.thamesclippers.com/)
3. Public Transport: Buses and trains also serve the area well, with frequent services to and from central London.

Transport Apps:

To help you navigate London, here are some useful transport apps:

1. Citymapper: (https://citymapper.com/london)
2. Google Maps: (https://maps.google.com)
3. TfL Go (Transport for London's official app): (https://tfl.gov.uk/maps_/tfl-go)

Taxi Services:

For convenient travel around London, consider using these taxi services:

1. Gett: (https://www.gett.com/uk/)
2. Uber: (https://www.uber.com/gb/en/)
3. FREE NOW: (https://www.free-now.com/uk/)

We hope these details help you plan your trip and make the most of your time in Greenwich. We can't wait to celebrate with you at the Trafalgar Tavern!
